name: ECG EKG Mastery
description: Finally learn to read that EKG!   The most convenient and complete resource for interpreting EKGs -- full of complete 12- lead ECG image strips, clinical guidelines, heart diagrams, and essentials for the ECG interpretation tips you will rely on again and again.   Eliminate the mystery of the electrocardiogram and develop expertise through mastery of 12-lead ECG interpretation with convenient, concise, and easy tutorials and tables for a comprehensive understanding. Use detailed images to help you diagnose and concise guidelines to plan treatment.  Brought to you by the makers of top-selling NCLEX Mastery, and as an essential companion to the new ACLS Mastery, ECG Mastery builds from the basics of rhythm interpretation and offers in-depth and step-by-step analysis of all rhythm types  even less common conditions such as Wolff-Parkinson-White Syndrome. This app discusses how to accurately identify many common conditions such as hyperkalemia, and provides standard sequences for determining rhythm, axis, and infarct - so providers can gain confidence in the complete art of EKG interpretation.   Features: How ECGs are created & testing basics such as distinguishing precordial from limb leads Diagrams for lead placement and axis interpretation.  Dozens of 12-lead ECGs and cardiac diagrams Clear, easy-access guidelines, tables, and 12-lead ECGs strips  A complete library of recent guidelines for clinical decision support clinical essentials to plan interventions for any abnormal ECG  Vital information including how to identify and treat hypertrophy, ischemia, injury, and infarct, pulmonary embolism, and many others conditions ECG effects from electrolyte disturbance, toxicity and medication therapy Arrhythmias, conduction blocks, and much more- including junctional rhythms and ventricular ectopy  Categories Include:  Hypertrophy Ischemia, injury, and infarct Conduction blocks Common and rare arrhythmias Electrolyte disorders Drug effects Cardiac diagnostic studies  And Resynchronization devices - includes pacemakers and implantable defibrillators!  This app breaks down complex ECG language simply to enhance understandingwhether you are a paramedic, nurse, clinician, or medical student. You can study on-the-go with full ECG strips, quick reference charts, core clinical facts, and detailed images.   Never again be confused by a 12-lead or wonder what an abnormal EKG means.
